title: Concurrent multiple bulk reverse return utility runs with the same parameters with property set to true
custom_preconds:
The event.bulk.reverse.return.utility.supplier.check.enabled setting is true on Application Settings
Event /Package sale should have been performed and tickets should be available to be refunded
custom_test_purpose: Verify that when the bulk reverse refund utility is triggered with the same parameters more than once at the same time, only the first run completes successfully, and the subsequent runs fail.
custom_steps:
Launch the bulk reverse refund utility with specific parameters.
Simultaneously trigger the same bulk refund utility with the same parameters in different sessions (different browser)
custom_expected: Only the first utility run completes successfully. The secondary run fails with appropriate error message .

title: Restrict running bulk refund utility for the same supplier until the first run completes with property set to true
custom_preconds:
The bulk refund utility is running for a specific supplier.
The event.bulk.reverse.return.utility.supplier.check.enabled setting is true on Application Settings
Event /Package sale should have been performed and tickets should be available to be refunded
custom_test_purpose: Verify that when the bulk refund utility is triggered for a specific supplier, another utility run for the same supplier cannot be launched until the first run completes, given event.bulk.reverse.return.utility.supplier.check.enabled is true.
custom_steps:
Launch the bulk refund utility for a specific supplier.
While the utility is running, attempt to launch another bulk refund utility for the same supplier.
custom_expected: The system does not allow another bulk refund utility run for the same supplier until the first run completes.

title: Allow Bulk Refunds for the Same Supplier with property set to false
custom_test_purpose: Verify that when the event.bulk.reverse.return.utility.supplier.check.enabled setting is false, multiple bulk Event Return Reverse utility runs for the same supplier can be launched concurrently.
custom_steps:
Launch the bulk refund utility for a specific supplier.
While the utility is running, attempt to launch another Event Return Reverse utility run for the same supplier.
custom_expected: The system should allow multiple Event Return Reverse utility runs for the same supplier concurrently.

title: Prevent Concurrent Event Return Reverse Utility Runs in Multiple ProVenue Tabs on same browser instance
custom_preconds: ProVenue is open in multiple tabs/windows in a browser.
custom_test_purpose: Verify that ProVenue does not allow the same Event Return Reverse utility to run with the same criteria/supplier in multiple browser tabs simultaneously
custom_steps:
Open multiple tabs in a browser.
Attempt to run the Event Return Reverse utility with the same criteria in more than one tab simultaneously
custom_expected: The Event Return Reverse utility with the same criteria should not be allowed to be run more than once at the same time on different browser tabs
